£8.95 30-44 min

Luton £9.95 0-30 min
£12.95 31-45 mins

St Pancras Eurostar £6.20 0-20 min
£7.75 20-40 mins
£8.85 40-60 min

Drop-off charges

The following Drop-Off Charges apply to the locations below:

Luton Airport £5 for the first 10 minutes, then £1 per minute thereafter.
Stansted Airport £7 for the first 15 minutes, then £25 thereafter.
City Airport £5 for the first 10 minutes, then £1 for each additional minute up to 20 minutes.
Gatwick  Airport £5 for the first 10 minutes, then £1 for each additional minute up to 20 minutes. 30 minutes maximum length of stay and a maximum charge of £25.
Heathrow Airport £5.00
